name: cave-mouth
description: Sunlight streams down from an opening high above, you are in the bottom of a narrow ravine.

features.name: cave-mouth-door
features.placement: A simple wooden [door] is tucked into the rock wall. It looks like it's unlocked.
features.description: The door is made of a dark brown wood with a polished iron handle.

action.move_msg: You open the door and step through.

features.name: cave-mouth-trapdoor
features.placement: A thin outline in the stone floor reveals a [trapdoor] below your feet.
features.description: It almost completely blends into its surroundings, but you notice a crack you could use to pry it open.

action.move_msg: You enter the trapdoor and climb down the ladder below.
action.locked_msg: Your fingers aren't able to pry it open, maybe there's a tool you can use.
action.unlock_msg: You slide the crowbar into the side of the trapdoor and pry it open.
action.unlock_placement: There is an open [trapdoor] beneath you, leading into a dark hole.
action.unlock_description: It's made of a thick heavy stone, you can just barely make out a ladder descending into the darkness below.

items.name: small-key
items.description: It's a small iron key on a short length of string.
items.placement: A [small-key] is hanging on the wall.

name: store-room
description: You are in a small store room dimly lit by a lantern.

features.name: store-room-door
features.description: The door is made of a dark brown wood with a polished iron handle.
features.placement: There is a simple wooden [door] on one wall.

action.move_msg: You open the door and step through.

items.name: crowbar
items.description: It's a little bit rusty but seems sturdy enough.
items.placement: An old [crowbar] is leaning against the wall.

name: basement
description: You find yourself in a dark cellar, barely lit by the light coming down from above.

features.name: basement-ladder
features.description: It looks like it's been here awhile, but it seems sturdy enough.
features.placement: A wooden [ladder] leads up to the trapdoor.

action.move_msg: You climb up the ladder and emerge from the trapdoor.

features.name: basement-door
features.description: A strange face is hammered into the center of the door, and its eyes seem to follow you.
features.placement: An ominous looking [iron-door] stands across from you.

action.move_msg: With some effort you manage to pull the heavy door open and step through, but it slams shut behind you.

name: dungeon
description: Torches line the walls of this underground chamber. Stone bricks line the floor, and you noticed what looks like dried blood covering the walls.

features.name: dungeon-iron-door
features.description: A strange face is hammered into the center of the door, and its eyes seem to follow you.
features.placement: An ominous looking [iron-door] is on one side of the room.

action.move_msg: With some effort you manage to pull the heavy door open and step through, but it slams shut behind you.
action.locked_msg: This side requires a key, but you don't have one that fits.
action.unlock_msg: You insert the [dungeon-key] and twist it, the door unlocks with a satisfying click.

enemies.name: dungeon-skeleton
enemies.placement: A [skeleton] stands in the corner holding a sword. It's not moving right now, but it seems ready to attack at any moment.
enemies.description: You notice it has a key hanging from its neck, but it's not going to give it up without a fight.

item.name: dungeon-key
item.description: It's an old skeleton key with a handle that looks like a skull.
item.placement: The [dungeon-key] lies on the floor atop a pile of bones.
